description: Deletes one or more versions of a recipe at a time. The entire request will be rejected if: The request will complete successfully, but with partial failures, if: The LATEST_WORKING version will only be deleted if the recipe has no other versions. If you try to delete LATEST_WORKING while other versions exist (or if they can't be deleted), then LATEST_WORKING will be listed as partial failure in the response.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the recipe whose versions are to be deleted.

parameters.name: RecipeVersions
parameters.description: An array of version identifiers, for the recipe versions to be deleted. You can specify numeric versions ( X.Y) or LATEST_WORKING. LATEST_PUBLISHED is not supported. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the recipe that was modified.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Errors, if any, that occurred while attempting to delete the recipe versions.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The HTTP status code for the error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The text of the error message.

nested_items.name: RecipeVersion
nested_items.description: The identifier for the recipe version associated with this error.
